title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Install Navigraph - Charts 8 In-Game Panel Beta
description:
In this video we will have a look at how you can install the beta version of Navigraph's Charts 8 In-Game Panel which has is now open for all Navigraph ultimate subscribers. The panel will add a lot of functionality which is also part of Chart 8 however there are some limitations due to the browser environment which is used for the In-Game Panel addons.

After having a look at how to install it we will walk through the panel to see what functionalities are available.
